Entries.Abigail: I know Sebastian and Sam don't stand a chance against me. But @, you're a bit of a wildcard.
I've gotta admit, everybody looks pretty good dressed up for the dance. We clean up nice around here!
I brought a pumpkin to put in the soup, but they said I couldn't do that. It's out of season!#$e#Who in the heck are these people? Sheesh!$h
I love getting to see the Moonlight Jellies. They really help me get out of my own head.
Before you came around, my Dad didn't have much competition in the Grange Display contest. Go easy on him, will ya? He could use a win.
Will you go ahead of me, @, and check to see if there are spiders around that corner? Let me know if the coast is clear!
Check out my snowgoon, @! What do you think?#$b#He does not look like me, you blobfish! Say that again and you're getting snow down your shirt!$h
Check out my Mom, @. I think she traded tea for egg nog today. She's funny when she's tipsy.$h
